links.title: Kelley on Twitter
links.description: Lesson in Life: Be very careful of ANYONE you let in your life from the "social media/trading industry". My life was turned upside down at the end of July by someone I "viewed as a friend." There is something very wrong when a man targets a female.

messages.body:
$AAPL  Functioning Apple computer built in 1970s up for auctio. Original price was $666. of all prices.  
 
https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/26/functioning-apple-computer-built-in-1970s-up-for-auction.html

links.title: Functioning Apple computer built in 1970s up for auction
links.description: Justin Sullivan | Getty Images A piece of computer history that helped launch a trillion dollar company is hitting the auction block. A fully functioning Apple-1 being auctioned by Boston-based RR Auction in September is one of only 60 or so remaining of the original 200 that were designed and built by Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak in 1976 and 1977.

links.title: Tesla Model 3 fan-made commercial invokes the elusive 'soul' of electric cars
links.description: Tesla fan and filmmaker Jono Seneff once drove his father's Model S 75D, and it gave him an experience unlike any other. Jono knew the specs of the vehicle prior to his drive, such as its 0-60 mph time, its battery capacity, and its range per charge.
